roleset.name: work out terms of agreement, again
roleset.note: RENEGOTIATE-V NOTES: Treebank sometimes puts the co-negotiator in with the agreement, whichis certainly plausible (ie, "negotiating a pact with GM" is it a pactwith GM or a negotiation with GM? (Both, really.) Follow Treebank'sparsing. (from renegotiate.01-v)

example.name: NP/PP
example.text: [Both companies]-1 are in the process of *trace*-1 renegotiating contracts with LTV and others.

example.name: double PP
example.text: It-1 recently signed a preliminary agreement *trace*-1 to renegotiate exclusively with the Bank of Tokyo Ltd. for the sale of part of its leasing business to the Japanese bank.
example.arg: with the Bank of Tokyo Ltd.
for the sale of part of its leasing business to the Japanese bank

example.name: unstated agreement
example.text: Although [Georgia Gulf]-1 hasn't been eager *trace*-1 to renegotiate with Mr. Simmons and NL, a specialty chemicals concern...
example.arg: with Mr. Simmons and NL, a specialty chemicals concern,

example.name: unstated co-negotiator
example.text: Santa Fe has disclosed that it is renegotiating to sell a 20% interest in its real estate unit to the California Public Employees Retirement System for roughly $400 million.
example.arg: to sell a 20 % interest in its real estate unit to the California Public Employees Retirement System for roughly $400 million
